org.dockbox.hartshorn.api

Class HartshornBootstrap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dockbox.hartshorn.di.ApplicationContextAware

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinecraftServerBootstrap

    public abstract class HartshornBootstrap
extends InjectableBootstrap
    The global bootstrapping component which instantiates all configured services and provides access to server information.
